parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: 0 = x axis 1 = y axis 2 = z axis

title: IMassProperty2.PrincipalAxesOfInertia
description: Gets the principal axis of inertia for the specified axis.

parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: 0 = x axis 1 = y axis 2 = z axis

remarks:
This method returns:
A vector that represents the specified Axis: lx, ly, or lz.
Metric units unless explicitly specified otherwise.
If
IMassPropertyOverrideOptions::OverrideMomentsOfInertia
is true or
IMassProperty2::IncludeHiddenBodiesOrComponents
is reset, then call
IMassProperty2::Recalculate
before using this property.
